headline.main: NAZIS PIERCE LINE BELOW MOSCOW; Threat Develops Southwest of Capital -- Rostov Drive Stalls -- Crimean Thrust Gains NAZIS PIERCE LINE BELOW MOSCOW

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Friday, Oct. 31 -- A serious threat to the Moscow defenses from the south-west has developed in the last twenty-four hours, it was acknowledged by an authoritative Soviet broadcaster early today.
snippet: BERNE, Switzerland, Friday, Oct. 31 -- A serious threat to the Moscow defenses from the south-west has developed in the last twenty-four hours, it was acknowledged by an authoritative Soviet broadcaster early today....

byline.original: By DANIEL T. BRIGHAMBy Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
